tool_description: Track packages from over 600 couriers worldwide. Get shipment info easily from official site.
name: Order Tracking
title: Order Tracking

api_list.name: Realtime tracking
api_list.description: Get realtime tracking results of a single tracking
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://order-tracking.p.rapidapi.com/trackings/realtime"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "order-tracking.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://order-tracking.p.rapidapi.com/trackings/realtime"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "order-tracking.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
